pages.text: These small, windged insects with big multiple large eyes called Flies are around the Overworld.$(br2)They are attracted to dead dying things, for example, Zomibes. Flies can be bred with Rotten Flesh.$(br2)On death, they may drop Maggots, this can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadruners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/capuchin_monkey)Capuchin Monkeys$(/l).
If a Fly happens to find itself in the Nether, it will transform into a dangerous $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l).
